data.text:
It's been a while since I've see a Night-vision scene in a movie. If you're wondering how to achieve realistic night-vision in Cinema 4D + After Effects, this tutorial covers our workflow for Operation: Deli Platter :) #blauwfilms #operationdeliplatter #cinema4d #chaoscorona #aftereffects #compositing https://lnkd.in/g2x6TGsN

In recent years, I've learned that a lot of people need this 2-part lesson. View for free, pass it on and share it. We can make the world a better place for filmmakers, editors, and film lovers. The moral of the story is: "If you want a different perspective, you have to be in a different place." #endthejumpcut #movethecamera Part 1: https://rb.gy/4cov1 Part 2: https://rb.gy/oixc4
